Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.media

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.media.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    A viewport on a render medium providing for mapping between absolute and relative/rendered positions.

      • Camera

        public Camera​(Vector position,
              Vector unitPixels,
              float width,
              float height)
        Constructs a new camera.
        Parameters:
        position - absolute camera position
        unitPixels - number of pixels within 1 unit of absolute distance along each axis
        width - render medium width
        height - render medium height

    • Method Detail

      • getAbsolutePosition

        public Vector getAbsolutePosition​(Vector relative)
        Calculates and returns the absolute position of a relative position vector. The returned vector is shared by all invocations of this method and getRelativePosition(Vector).
        Parameters:
        relative - relative position
        Returns:
        absolute position of relative

      • getRelativePosition

        public Vector getRelativePosition​(Vector absolute)
        Calculates and returns the relative position of an absolute position vector. The returned vector is shared by all invocations of this method and getAbsolutePosition(Vector).
        Parameters:
        absolute - absolute position
        Returns:
        position of absolute relative to this camera

      • getPosition

        public Vector getPosition​()
        Returns:
        camera position

      • getUnitPixels

        Returns:

        public void setUnitPixels​(Vector unitPixels)
        Parameters:
